trailingComments.value:
*
 * Generate the dynamic form validator hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of form validators, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for validator you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} validatorPath Current validator path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} validators Current validator hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found validators where the key is the validator name.

*
 * Helper functions for dynamic loading of form validators.
 *
 * @module Helpers/FormValidators

*
 * Form validator index array is computed by webpack at the time of the app build.
 *
 * @const

*
 * Generate the dynamic form validator hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of form validators, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for validator you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} validatorPath Current validator path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} validators Current validator hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found validators where the key is the validator name.
Consider only JS files and subdirectories.
For validators named `index`, get the name of the parent folder, and shorten the path accordingly.
Skip validators which do not reside in the specified base path.
Require registered validators and include it in the same chunk as this code

*
 * Get the dynamic form validator hash for all form field validators.
 *
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found form field validators where the key is the form validator name.

*
 * Helper functions for dynamic loading of form validators.
 *
 * @module Helpers/FormValidators

*
 * Form validator index array is computed by webpack at the time of the app build.
 *
 * @const

*
 * Generate the dynamic form validator hash based on the computed index.
 *
 * @param {Array} index Directory index of form validators, can be a subset.
 * @param {String} basePath Base path for validator you want to load (empty by default).
 * @param {String} validatorPath Current validator path (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @param {Object} validators Current validator hash (used during recursion, empty by default).
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found validators where the key is the validator name.
Consider only JS files and subdirectories.
For validators named `index`, get the name of the parent folder, and shorten the path accordingly.
Skip validators which do not reside in the specified base path.
Require registered validators and include it in the same chunk as this code

*
 * Get the dynamic form validator hash for all form field validators.
 *
 * @returns {Object} Hash of found form field validators where the key is the form validator name.
